meanings.definition: A substance found in certain plants that is believed to be beneficial to human health.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables rich in phytonutrients can help improve your overall well-being.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend including a variety of phytonutrients in your diet for better health.
meanings.sent3: I like to imagine phytonutrients as tiny plant superheroes fighting to keep us healthy.
meanings.sent4: The phytonutrients in leafy greens act like a shield, protecting our bodies from harm.
meanings.sent5: Think of phytonutrients as the colorful defenders of your health, guarding you from illness.

meanings.definition: A nutrient derived from plants that is thought to have positive effects on the body.
meanings.sent1: Including phytonutrients in your meals can boost your energy levels naturally.
meanings.sent2: Many herbal teas contain phytonutrients that promote relaxation and well-being.
meanings.sent3: I joked that phytonutrients are like plant-based vitamins, giving us a natural health boost.
meanings.sent4: The phytonutrients in berries are like little bursts of vitality for your body.
meanings.sent5: Imagine phytonutrients as plant-based nutrients that work wonders for your health.
